Sentencas: The Ruddlesden-Popper phase La2NiO4+delta (LNO214) has received a significant level of research attention with respect to its employment as a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell cathode material.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, it is known that there are many factors that are capable of influencing the performance of this phase when utilised in this role.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: One such factor that can impact on electrode behaviour is the choice of sintering temperature.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this paper, a study of this effect is detailed.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This is achieved via the use of both symmetrical and single cell testing configurations, with additional investigation provided by ex-situ analysis.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It is shown that a sizeable improvement in electrode performance can be achieved via an increase in sintering temperature.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This is despite observations on the reactivity between LNO214 and the contact electrolyte material Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Further, it is also demonstrated that the addition of a noble metal contacting layer can dramatically improve the performance of an LNO214 electrode.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In comparison, the impact of a contacting layer on a state-of-the-art La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta composition is shown to be relatively minor.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This has implications towards SOFC testing methodologies given the widespread employment of noble metal contacting pastes.
Titulo: The effects of sintering temperature and current contacting layer on the performance of lanthanum nickelate electrodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
